function chunk 

@function chunk () { ... }

Description

Chunks $list into $size large lists<br />@param {List} $list - list to chunk @param {Number} $size - length of lists

Parameters

None.

Returns

List | false

Throws

  • `$size` is not a number for `chunk`.

function explode 

@function explode () { ... }

Description

Explode $string into a list using $delimiter as a delimiter<br />@param {String} $string - string to explode @param {String} $separator ('') - string to use as a delimiter

Parameters

None.

Returns

List | false

Throws

  • `$string` is not a string for `explode`.
  • `$delimiter` is not a string for `explode`.

function insert-nth 

@function insert-nth () { ... }

Description

Adds $value at $index in $list<br />@param {List} $list - list to update @param {Number} $index - index to add @param {Literal} $value - value to add

Parameters

None.

Returns

List | false

Throws

  • List index `$index` is not a number for `insert-nth`.
  • List index `$index` must be a non-zero integer for `insert-nth`.

Description

function slice 

@function slice () { ... }

Description

Slices $list between $start and $end<br />@param {List} $list - list to slice @param {Number} $start (1) - start index @param {Number} $end (length($list)) - end index

Parameters

None.

Returns

List | false

Throws

  • List indexes `$start` and `$end` must be numbers for `slice`.
  • Start index has to be lesser than or equals to the end index for `slice`.
  • List indexes must be non-zero integers for `slice`.
  • Start index has to be lesser than or equal to list length for `slice`.
  • End index has to be lesser than or equal to list length for `slice`.

function walk 

@function walk () { ... }

Description

Apply $function to every item from $list passing $args as parameters<br />@param {List} $list - list to update @param {String} $function - function to call on each value @param {ArgList} $args - optional function arguments

Parameters

None.

Returns

List | false

Throws

  • There is no `$function` function.
